Sentencas: In solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs), the substantial performance degradation of nickel (Ni) yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) fuel electrode has been a growing challenge for commercialization.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The microstructure of Ni-YSZ electrode is not stable during long-term operation due to Ni phase redistribution.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: In the present study, operando observations of patterned Ni film electrodes under SOFC, SOEC and reversible solid oxide cell (RSOC) operation modes are conducted.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Confocal laser scanning microscopy is applied to acquire real-time microscopy images of the three phase boundary (TPB) under three operation modes to study the Ni mobility on the YSZ surface.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The operando observation showed that the Ni phase dynamically spreads and splits up only under the SOFC mode, while this phenomenon is not observed under the SOEC mode.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Ni coarsening occurs regardless of the operation mode.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The dynamic motion of active TPB qualitatively correlates with the variation in the current density during the operation.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The contact angles of Ni on flat YSZ surface after operation are the smallest for SOFC, followed by RSOC and the largest for SOEC.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Competition between the altered Ni wettability and the Ni agglomeration finally determines the complicated Ni morphological changes.
Titulo: Operando observations of active three phase boundary of patterned nickel- Yttria stabilized zirconia electrode in solid oxide cell
